emailTemplate.subject: Review needed on an appeal in $core_v2_configuration.SiteName
emailTemplate.htmlBody:
#set($post = $core_v2_content.Current) #set($author = $core_v2_user.Get("%{Id=$post.CreatedByUserId}")) #set($appeal = $core_v2_abuseAppeal.Current) #set($params = "%{}") $params.Add("AbuseAppealId", $appeal.AppealId) #if ($appeal.Content && $appeal.Content.Application && $appeal.Content.Application.Container) $params.Add("ContainerId", $appeal.Content.Application.Container.ContainerId) #end #set($appealUrl = $core_v2_urls.AppealQueue($params, false))

$appeal.AuthorResponse

#set($post = $core_v2_content.Current) #set($author = $core_v2_user.Get("%{Id=$post.CreatedByUserId}")) #set($appeal = $core_v2_abuseAppeal.Current) #set($params = "%{}") $params.Add("AbuseAppealId", $appeal.AppealId) #if ($appeal.Content && $appeal.Content.Application && $appeal.Content.Application.Container) $params.Add("ContainerId", $appeal.Content.Application.Container.ContainerId) #end #set($appealUrl = $core_v2_urls.AppealQueue($params, false))
